name: Super Coin Pusher (itch)
description:
A coin pusher game made for the Video Games Lab: Game Jam 2021

It's my first Unity project ever and my first game in 3D overall

LEFT CLICK OR PRESS "A" TO DROP A COIN

Free Assets Used: 

  • Devtoid - GoldCoins (Unity Assets Store) 
  • SkySerie Freebie (Unity Assets Store) 
  • Trash Pack Low Poly ( Unity Assets Store ) 
  • Yughues Free Metal Material
  • Mixkit royalty free sound (https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/coin/)
  • Zapsplat
